definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: There are also the purely personal predilections of each individual musician.
sentences.chinese: 每一個音樂家都有完全個人的偏愛。

sentences.english: Can you give some advice for those who want to be musicians in New York City?
sentences.chinese: 對於那些想在紐約成爲音樂家的人，你能給些建議嗎？

sentences.english: A - Hi, I heard you are a talented Classical musician.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，我聽說你是天才的古典音樂家。

sentences.english: It said about a famous musician.
sentences.chinese: 電影說的是一個著名的音樂家。

sentences.english: Many young musicians in Iraq are self-taught.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克很多年輕音樂家都是自學成才的。

sentences.english: The last example will sort a list of bands and musicians.
sentences.chinese: 最後一個例子對一些樂隊和音樂家排序。

sentences.english: Stagehands are in charge of tuning the instruments for the musicians.
sentences.chinese: 舞臺工作人員負責幫音樂家們調樂器的音調。

sentences.english: Animato Music Studio is a music education centre established by a group of education workers and musicians.
sentences.chinese: 是一個由教育工作者及音樂家創辦的音樂傳藝中心。

sentences.english: Musicians had no advantage when it came to pure tone thresholds.
sentences.chinese: 當涉及純音閾值時音樂家沒有優勢。

sentences.english: This musician has a great future.
Jiang Wenye is an exceptional musician in the modern and contemporary music history of China.
sentences.chinese: 江文也是我國近現代音樂史上一位特殊的音樂家。

sentences.english: This is particularly true of performances of musical artists on radio when they visit for an in-studio concert performance.
sentences.chinese: 特別是音樂家坐訪音樂會廣播錄製時，尤爲如此。

sentences.english: Another enduring art from our earliest days is that of the musician.
sentences.chinese: 另一個從遠古就開始存在的職業是音樂家。

sentences.english: She arrived in a golden boat with a team of musicians and servants.
sentences.chinese: 她來到一個有音樂家和公務員隊伍金船。

sentences.english: He introduced himself to me as a musician from Britain.
sentences.chinese: 他自我介紹說他是從英國來的音樂家。

definition: to read aloud with expression/to recite/to declaim
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
